name: Dude 'n Nem
description:
'''Dude 'n Nem''' was an American [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] duo consisting of [[Chicago]] rappers Trygic and Upmost.

The duo signed to [[TVT Records]] and released the single "Watch My Feet" in 2007. The single peaked at number 20 on the US ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs#Bubbling Under R&B/Hip-Hop Singles|Bubbling Under R&B/Hip-Hop Singles]] chart. [[Pitchfork Media]] listed "Watch My Feet" as the fiftieth best track of 2007. The song was also featured on the soundtrack to [[Need for Speed: ProStreet]]. Their debut studio album, ''Tinted Incubators'', was released in October 2007. In 2008, the duo were featured on rapper [[Yung Berg]]'s single "[[Do That There]]".
